Name: Ten 2 Ten Poker
About the game: Ten 2 ten Poker is a 2 player turn based card game where the players take turns building poker hands. If you already know poker, learning Ten 2 Ten Poker is super simple! You don't have to worry about counting cards because all cards that have been dealt are always face up. Each poker hand you build is worth a certain amount of points. The player with the most points after 5 rounds wins. You can play by yourself, with a friend by creating/joining a private room, or against a random player with the Quick Match option. Each player is dealt 10 cards each and 2 community cards are placed in the middle. During each of your 5 turns you must select 5 cards to build a hand. This is where the strategy comes in. Will you play it safe and select a full house or will you save that 3 of a kind for the next round to see if you can build a 4 of a kind worth a ton of points? These are the types of the choices that make Ten 2 Ten Poker a fun and addicting card game.
